net.jbasics.util

Class Ensure

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jbasics.util.Ensure

  • public final class Ensure
extends Object

    Used in defensive programming to remove nulls and check for invalid floating point values.

    Many of these routines simply call the Apache Commons ArrayUtils methods. This class provides a nice verb-based ("Ensure") interface to better describe the reason a particular method is being called. Some examples: 

        final long   lvar = Ensure.notNull(longObject);
    final String str  = Ensure.notNull(stringObject);
    final double doub = Ensure.finite(doubleObject);

    No exceptions are thrown by any of these methods.

    Version:
    2020-01-12
    Author:
    Rob Stoecklein
